title: What determines the champion on your profile/mouseover ?
body:
I've looked up similar questions and they haven't given me a proper answer. Some say its random, most say its recent but It's definitely not.

I have Blitzcrank and I play him rarely. He's not in the top 3 of my recent played matches/heroes too.

Does anyone have a solid answer on what determines the champion? Thanks

replies.body: I think it's the most played out of 20 recent games

Well my only conclusion is that it updates every day once, and it takes that champion that you last played. Since it can't be the MOST RECENT champion and nor is it the most played in recent games for my status.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dXyWmFzE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-11T20:10:24.334+0000)
>
> I agree wih Lew's info!  Additionally, the background can show the champion you most recently played.  Keep playing another champ to get that profile updated.  I hope that helps!
